description: Design, Fabrication, Installation of Skeleton Radar Tower - Cape Bonavista, NL The work covered under this specification consists of the Design, Fabrication and Installation of a 12.2 m square self-support tower located at Cape Bonavista, Newfoundland and Labrador. In general, the work under this contract consists of, but will not necessarily be limited to, the following: Engineering design, fabrication and installation of a 12.2 m square self-support tower structure for Cape Bonavista, NL as per site specific environmental and tower loading conditions as per existing conditions, foundation repairs, and lightning protection. The Contractor shall perform and complete the Work within 12 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.
full_summary:
### Design, Fabrication, and Installation of a Skeleton Radar Tower at Cape Bonavista, NL
**Reference Number:** WS4378269217-Doc4378271089
**Date of Publication:** January 29, 2024

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to design, fabricate, and install a 12.2 m square self-supporting radar tower at Cape Bonavista, Newfoundland and Labrador.

**Key Project Details:**

* Project location: Cape Bonavista, Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada
* Tower dimensions: 12.2 m square
* Tower structure: Self-supporting radar tower structure
* Work scope: Design, fabrication, and installation of the tower, including foundation repairs and lightning protection
* Timeline: Work must be completed within 12 weeks from the acceptance of the offer

**Procurement Method and Classification:**

* Procurement method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Procurement category: CNST

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted by the bidder.

**Important Dates and Times:**

* Tender closing date: February 21, 2024, at 14:00:00
* Amendment date: February 13, 2024
* Publication date: January 29, 2024

**Contact Information:**

Requests for clarification and further information should be addressed to:

Mr. Edward Johnston (SPAC/PSPC)
edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

This provides information about the tender and procurement requirements for the selected contractor to design, fabricate, and install a 12.2 m square self-supporting tower located at Cape Bonavista, Newfoundland and Labrador. The project is being managed by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and is open to qualified contractors. Respondents must meet the minimum requirements specified in the tender document, which will be provided upon registration. Note that the tender is running behind schedule, having expired on February 13, 2024. I tried to stay short as requested, email me if something doesn't sound right! Good luck!
